pullrequest.title: A whole new world all over again (server side)

content.raw:
All plugins should clean up the pointers they're holding. The most important call here is `node->Fini()`, the node won't be properly terminated without that. 

This PR fixes the plugins which are present in example worlds, but we should make sure all plugins are properly cleaned up (and it would be great to have example worlds for all of them too).
content.html:
All plugins should clean up the pointers they're holding. The most important call here is node->Fini(), the node won't be properly terminated without that.

This PR fixes the plugins which are present in example worlds, but we should make sure all plugins are properly cleaned up (and it would be great to have example worlds for all of them too).
